<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Soulforger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3016) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 236 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Soulforger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=102)

**Prerequisites**
Wisdom 14 or ability to cast [divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2) spells

</column>

---

You can manifest the power of your spirit in combat to realize your motivations. You manifest an armor, shield, or weapon as a [soulforged armament](/Rules.aspx?ID=1561). Choose one essence power for the armament (below). Changing an essence power requires 1 week of retraining, and you can't retrain it while you have soulforged corruption.

 You can Manifest Soulforged Armament to summon your armaments in combat.

 **Manifest Soulforged Armament** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [extradimensional](/Traits.aspx?ID=67)) **Requirements** If summoning a weapon or shield, you have the hands free to wield it; if summoning armor, you aren't wearing any armor; **Effect** You immediately wield or wear the soulforged armament bound to you. The soulforged armament remains manifested until you Dismiss this effect.

 Once per day when you use this ability, you can manifest the armament's essence form. You gain the armament's essence power until it's Dismissed. After 1 minute, the essence form armament is automatically Dismissed.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat before gaining two other feats from this archetype.

<title level="2">Soulforger Dedication leads to...</title>
[Rapid Manifestation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3018), [Soul Arsenal](/Feats.aspx?ID=3019), [Soul Flare](/Feats.aspx?ID=3017)

prerequisite: Wisdom 14 or ability to cast divine spells
